sources.title: The Riverbank | Full Movie | Mystery Thriller | Kari Matchett
sources.description:
The Riverbank is an ingenious psychological thriller. At its center is Kate Mason, is a thirty-something anthropologist who delves deep into her family’s secrets to discover the truth behind the disappearance of her mother 30 years ago.
2012.  Stars: Rick Roberts, Kenneth Welsh, Kari Matchett

metadata.Plot: A woman returns to her hometown following the death of her fathers second wife, which leads her to uncover dark family secrets.
metadata.Actors: Rick Roberts, Kenneth Welsh, Kari Matchett
